result.title: Why use Trie at all??
result.content: hello guys, i know this might sound silly. I was just studying trie the other day and i wanted to ask that why do we use it at all we can maintain a directed graph of 26*26 where G[i][j] corresponds to whether j is a child of letter i. Could somebody explain how i am wrong with an example. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks a lot in advance.
